title: SCI-FI VOCALIZATIONS: PACK1
description: Bring Your Characters to Life with Futuristic English Vocalizations
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE

Elevate your game with "SCI-FI VOCALIZATIONS: PACK1," a comprehensive audio asset pack crafted for futuristic, space, cyberpunk, sci-fi, robotic, and hi-tech game environments. This pack features a diverse collection of English words and phrases, each available in 21 distinct tonalities/styles including male, female, kid, walkie-talkie, space echoes, robots, and more. Perfect for enhancing character dialogue, AI communications, mission briefings, and ambient sounds, this pack ensures your game’s audio landscape is as immersive as its visuals. Whether you're building an epic space opera, a gritty cyberpunk adventure, or a high-tech robotic world, these vocalizations will add the perfect touch.


Here is the alphabetically ordered list of included words and phrases:

  • Acknowledged
  • Activate
  • Activate system

  • All systems functioning

technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 1911


Number of Audio Waves: 1911 + 1911

Number of Audio Cues: 1911 + 1911

Sample rate / bit rate: 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Loopable: NO

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 47:24
